Package controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
controller.UserController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplicantController, HdbManagerController, HdbOfficerController
public class UserController extends Object
Handles general user operations such as login and registration

    • login

      public User login(String userId, String password)
      Handles user login
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID/username
      password - The user's password
      Returns:
      The authenticated User object or null if authentication fails

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(User user, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the password for a user
      Parameters:
      user - The user to change password for
      oldPassword - The current password
      newPassword - The new password
      Returns:
      true if password change successful, false otherwise

    • updateProfile

      public boolean updateProfile(User user, Map<String,Object> updates)
      Updates user profile information
      Parameters:
      user - The user to update
      updates - Map of profile fields to update
      Returns:
      true if update successful, false otherwise
